list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: physical harm caused to something in such a way as to impair its value, usefulness, or normal function.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: bombing caused extensive damage to the town
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bát bom gây thiệt hại sâu rộng cho thị trấn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sum of money claimed or awarded in compensation for a loss or an injury.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đã được trao 284.000 đô la thiệt hại

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: inflict physical harm on (something) so as to impair its value, usefulness, or normal function.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the car was badly damaged in the accident
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chiếc xe bị hư hại nặng nề trong vụ tai nạn
